name: Appointment Location
description: When a user creates an appointment service and chooses a location, they may only choose one with this tag

name: Queue Room
description: A tag to indicate a queue room used by the queuing module

name: Main Pharmacy
description: Main pharmacy location.

name: Dispensary
description: A dispensary.

name: Main Store
description: A location which is the main facility stock holding area.

name: Admission Location
description: Patients may only be admitted to inpatient care in a location with this tag

name: Login Location
description: When a user logs in and chooses a session location, they may only choose one with this tag

name: Transfer Location
description: Patients may only be transferred (within the hospital) to a location with this tag

name: Visit Location
description: Visits are only allowed to happen at locations tagged with this location tag or at locations that descend from a location tagged with this tag.

name: Organization
description: Identifies an Organization

name: Department
description: Identifies a department in a Hospital/clinic etc

name: Clinic
description: Identifies a clinic in the organization/hospital

name: Reception
description: The tag to identify a reception point

name: Triage
description: The tag to identify a triage point

name: Clinical Room
description: The tag to identify a Clinical Room point

name: Laboratory
description: A tag to indicate a laboratory

name: Theater
description: A tag to indicate a theater

name: Radiology
description: A tag to indicate a radiology service room

name: Supportive Service
description: Services that support patient care such as lab pharmacy

name: Main Laboratory
description: A main area for carrying out patient tests
